name: Chambre de commerce européenne du Bénin
goal:
Our organisation is the European Chamber of Commerce of Benin. Ours mains goals are :
- networking
- conference
- training
- be an interface between the private sector and the local institutions
- help with the installation of companies
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Communication, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Taxation, Trade
